naslov: Prekrasna nova, moderna villa - Klis, NAJAM (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Posredujemo u najmu potpuno nove moderne ville s bazenom smještene u Klisu, nedaleko od Splita. Villa ima 120m2 stambenog prostora te 80m2 dvorišta s bazenom i dodatnim sadržajima. Proteže se na dvije etaže, ima tri spavaće sobe, svaka ima svoje kupatilo na gornjoj etaži, a na donjoj etaži nalazi se luksuzna kuhinja s blagovaonom i dnevnim boravkom iz kojeg se izlazi na predivan dvor s bazenom i ležaljkama, kominom za uživanje na otvorenom! Na donjoj etaži nalazi se još jedan dodatan sanitarni čvor. Kuća je koncipirana vrlo funkcionalo, moderno, uređena s puno stila te opremljena svim visoko kvalitetnim aparatima. Ima parking sa kapacitetom nekoliko auta… Villa se iznajmljuje na period 01.10.2025.-01.06.2026. po cijeni od 2500€ mjesečno. Postoji mogućnost i dugoročnog najma po cijeni od 3500€ mjesečno. Do grada Solina je svega nekoliko minuta, jednako kao i do svih bitnih i potrebnih sadržaja, a do Splita ju dijeli svega 15 minuta autom… Za sve dodatne info KONTAKT: 0915616295 (ANDREA) We are renting a brand new modern villa with a pool located in Klis, not far from Split. The villa has 120m2 of living space and 80m2 of yard with swimming pool and additional facilities. It extends over two floors, has three bedrooms, each with its own bathroom on the upper floor, and on the lower floor there is a luxurious kitchen with a dining room and a living room, from which there is access to a beautiful courtyard with a swimming pool and deckchairs, a fireplace for enjoying the outdoors! There is another additional toilet on the lower floor. The house is designed very functionally, modernly, decorated with a lot of style and equipped with all high-quality appliances. There is a parking lot with capacity for several cars... The villa is rented for the period 01.10.2025.-01.06.2026 at a price of €2,500 per month. There is possibility for long term rent too , price is 3500€ monhtly. The city of Solin is only a few minutes away, as well as all important and necessary facilities, and Split is only 15 minutes away by car... For all additional information CONTACT: 0915616295 (ANDREA)
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
Troškovi: Iznos agencijske provizije koju plaća najmoprimac: 2500 EUR
